mapper.update: update tb_user_customer set user_id=#{userId} where customer_id=#{customerId}
mapper.select: select customer_type from cus_customer where customer_id=#{customerId};

SELECT sys_user.username FROM tb_user_customer JOIN cus_customer ON tb_user_customer.customer_id = cus_customer.customer_id JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.user_id = tb_user_customer.user_id WHERE cus_customer.customer_id=#{customerId}

SELECT cus_customer.* FROM tb_user_customer JOIN cus_customer ON tb_user_customer.customer_id = cus_customer.customer_id JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.user_id = tb_user_customer.user_id WHERE sys_user.username = #{username};
